content:
Here are the settings: Incoming - server: imap.gmail.com - port 993 - security SSL/TLS - authentication: OAUTH2

Outgoing - server: smtp.gmail.com - port 465 - security SSL/TLS - authentication: OAUTH2

email address must be full address (the prefix and @gmail.com, e.g. anita@gmail.com, not just anita
creator: davidsk
